name: Pestilence
storyline:
Recently, a journalist hoping to make a name for herself has come across a number of recent criminal cases.
She has begun taking these cases apart in a bid for fame one at a time. Her first such case involves a missing person.
You play as this missing person and get to experience his story. You will experience environmental horror and stories of the many characters involved. As the player solves puzzles and travels between different environments, the struggle of memory loss keeps the player guessing as he uncovers his captor's twisted story.
summary: Players can expect to enter a 90's narrative-based psychological horror, where they get to experience a series of grim, dark, and very immersive environments while solving puzzles and unravelling the horror within.
